attributes.action: Call an election at the earliest date possible, according to parliamentary rules, following today’s date 15th May 2009.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Given the mass anger of the British Public over the abuse of the MP's expenses system the Prime Minister should resign immediately and call a general election to allow the British People to have their say on the conduct of their current elected Member of Parliament.
The people of the country have lost confidence in Members of Parliament, which can only be restored with an election that allows a full and open debate and the opportunity for the electorate to exercise their democratic right.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
